about.title: Your Trusted Partner in the Region
about.subtitle: Komfort Reality is a well-established real estate agency based in Ružomberok. For several years, we have been guiding clients through the process of selling, purchasing, and renting properties across the Liptov and Orava regions. Our mission is not only to complete the transaction but to ensure that the entire process is transparent, safe, and stress-free. We combine deep local market knowledge with a personal approach and complete legal support, providing a professional service you can rely on.

trusted.title: Fair Approach

services.title: Comprehensive Real Estate Solutions
services.subtitle: From initial consultation to key handover – we guide you through every step.

buying.title: Property Purchase
buying.description: We help you find the right property in Ružomberok, Liptov, and surrounding areas. We recommend suitable locations, verify legal status, and prepare documentation to ensure a smooth and secure purchase. From the first viewing to the final handover, you have a reliable partner by your side.

selling.title: Property Sales
selling.description: We handle the entire selling process – from setting the right price and preparing the property, to marketing, viewings, and contract signing. We provide legal documentation, coordinate with the cadastre, and assist with bank communication. Your goal is to sell safely; our goal is to make it happen smoothly.

legal.title: Legal Support
legal.description: We handle all legal aspects of the transaction – reservation contracts, purchase agreements, and cadastre submissions. We work with lawyers and notaries to ensure that all documents comply with current legislation and protect your interests.

valuation.title: Property Valuation
valuation.description: We provide professional market valuation of your property based on current market conditions, location, and property condition.

mortgage.title: Mortgage Assistance
mortgage.description: We cooperate with several financial institutions and help clients find the right mortgage solutions. We explain the terms, assist with required documentation, and coordinate with banks to ensure a seamless process.

management.title: Complete Care
management.description: We provide comprehensive service – from property search, through legal advisory, to final handover. Everything in one place, with emphasis on quality and security.
